data.name: Domino
data.description: Domino is X-Force's Controller whose Mutant luck lets her allies Dodge and deal deadlier Critical hits.

starItems.name: Domino
starItems.description: Domino is X-Force's Controller whose Mutant luck lets her allies Dodge and deal deadlier Critical hits.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain an assist

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain an assist

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Always gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally.

1.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>40%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>60%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
If Deadpool is an ally, transfer all negative effects from self and each <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally to Deadpool. Fill Speed Bar for Deadpool by <color=#86e619>80%</color>.

Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>30%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets while above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets while above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets while above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>. Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.
If this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets.

Dodge breaks this Chain.

1.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage. Apply <color=#86e619>-5%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
Apply <color=#86e619>-5%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies

2.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage. Apply <color=#86e619>-10%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Damage for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage. Apply <color=#86e619>-10%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
Apply <color=#86e619>-5%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies

4.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage. Apply <color=#86e619>-15%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage for Self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage. <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Crit Damage. Apply <color=#86e619>-15%</color> Crit Damage to all enemies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to all <color=#fff568>X-FORCE</color> allies.
